item.description:
We'll watch and discuss one or more segments from a 2010 CBS 60 Minutes broadcast related to health. Segments include: the current cost for end-of-life care delivered in hospitals, the issue of recognizing patents on human genes, and questions about the safety or danger from a chemical that is found in every-day products that may be leaching into our food. Join us and choose which parts to watch and discuss.

Refreshments will be served
item.how_to_find_us: We will probably be upstairs in the library, or in the social hall.
item.name: Conversations: 60 Minutes on Healthcare
